tagline: Select form fields and other interactive elements like <a> by visual descriptors like <label> or placeholder attributes. Labeled is a jQuery content filter and can be used like :labeled('Login') or input:labeled('email-address').
body: # Labeled - a jQuery Selection Extension Select form fields and other interactive elements like <a> by visual descriptors like <label> or placeholder attributes. Labeled is a jQuery content filter and can be used like :labeled('Login') or input:labeled('email-address'). ## Examples ### Links HTML: Anchor Text Node Find a: $(':labeled(Anchor Text Node)') // or $('a:labeled(Anchor Text Node)') ### Buttons HTML: Find input: $(':labeled(Click me)') ### Labeled Form Fields HTML: Find input: $(':labeled(Text Input Label Text Node)')
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Jquery-labeled
